doc.title: A Muppet Family Christmas

credit.role: The Great Gonzo/Gubber/Dr. Bunsen Honeydew/Boober Fraggle/Uncle 'Traveling' Matt Fraggle/Zoot/Beauregard/Chester the Rat
Kermit the Frog/Rowlf/Dr. Teeth/Swedish Chef/Waldorf/Ernie/Guy Smiley/Link Hogthrob/The Newsman/Himself
Scooter/Forgetful Jones/Janice/Statler/Beaker/Sully/Gladys the Cow/Stein - Two-Headed Monster/Osvaldo the Grouch/Snowman/Bobby Benson

Emily 'Ma' Bear/Robin the Frog/Sgt. Floyd Pepper/Count von Count/Herry Monster/Two-Headed Monster - Frank/Gobo Fraggle/Biff/Camilla the Chicken/Crazy Harry/Lew Zealand/Lewis Kazagger/Pops/Sherlock Hemlock/Fred the Wonder Horse/Simon Soundman
Fozzie Bear/Animal/Miss Piggy/Bert/Grover/Cookie Monster/Sam the Eagle/Marvin Suggs
Turkey/Rizzo the Rat/Foo-Foo/Wembley Fraggle/Sprocket the Dog/Lips

doc.plot: When Fozzie and the Muppet Show gang drop in unexpectedly on Fozzie's mother, she is forced to cancel her winter vacation plans and entertain them all. Soon the Sesame Street gang comes by as carolers, and then Kermit and his nephew Robin discover a Fraggle Rock hole in the basement. A snow storm blows in, stranding everyone at the house, except for Miss Piggy, who arrives just in time for all the Muppets to celebrate Christmas together.
